channel.title: New to Moparscape - help needed
channel.description:
I just got Moparscape and my Java is up to date....so idk the problem. It says
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefErrorFound: Bot[/code]
I'd really appericate anyone who replys because I want to try out armor, etc.
EDIT: I went to moparisthebest.com earlier and it worked...but then I forgot my username and pass....but I made it earlier when I forgot my username and pass...I just made a new one. Now it says to click start server, then user...But, what I said above about the java.lang was for the Moparscape I d/led.

item.title: New to Moparscape - help needed
item.dc:creator: @Dilweed Dilweed
item.description:
@Dilweed wrote:

I just got Moparscape and my Java is up to date…so idk the problem. It says

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefErrorFound: Bot

I’d really appericate anyone who replys because I want to try out armor, etc.

EDIT: I went to moparisthebest.com earlier and it worked…but then I forgot my username and pass…but I made it earlier when I forgot my username and pass…I just made a new one. Now it says to click start server, then user…But, what I said above about the java.lang was for the Moparscape I d/led.
